# React Frontend Setup for Hate Speech Detection Project

## Project Requirements
- React frontend with Material-UI
- Instagram-like social media interface
- User registration/login
- Profile page
- Post feed (images, text, comments, likes)
- Post creation
- Moderation alerts (warnings, suspensions)
- Admin dashboard
- Connect to Flask backend at http://localhost:5000

## Setup Steps

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md created
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project (React + MUI, routes, services)
- [x] Customize the Project (Instagram-like UI, auth, posts, admin)
- [x] Install Required Extensions (via project docs; ensure Node + npm available)
- [x] Compile the Project (React dev server, backend API validated)
- [x] Create and Run Task (scripts to start backend and frontend added)
- [~] Launch the Project (Backend running at http://localhost:5000; React helper script added for http://localhost:3002)
- [~] Ensure Documentation is Complete (most docs in repo; minor updates pending)
